00042 // To construct an error_code after a CUDA Runtime error:
00043 //
00044 //   error_code(::cudaGetLastError(), cuda_category())
00045 
00046 // XXX N3000 prefers enum class errc { ... }
00047 namespace errc
00048 {
00049 
00052 enum errc_t
00053 {
00054   // from cuda/include/driver_types.h
00055   // mirror their order
00056   success                      = cudaSuccess,
00057   missing_configuration        = cudaErrorMissingConfiguration,
00058   memory_allocation            = cudaErrorMemoryAllocation,
00059   initialization_error         = cudaErrorInitializationError,
00060   launch_failure               = cudaErrorLaunchFailure,
00061   prior_launch_failure         = cudaErrorPriorLaunchFailure,
00062   launch_timeout               = cudaErrorLaunchTimeout,
00063   launch_out_of_resources      = cudaErrorLaunchOutOfResources,
00064   invalid_device_function      = cudaErrorInvalidDeviceFunction,
00065   invalid_configuration        = cudaErrorInvalidConfiguration,
00066   invalid_device               = cudaErrorInvalidDevice,
00067   invalid_value                = cudaErrorInvalidValue,
00068   invalid_pitch_value          = cudaErrorInvalidPitchValue,
00069   invalid_symbol               = cudaErrorInvalidSymbol,
00070   map_buffer_object_failed     = cudaErrorMapBufferObjectFailed,
00071   unmap_buffer_object_failed   = cudaErrorUnmapBufferObjectFailed,
00072   invalid_host_pointer         = cudaErrorInvalidHostPointer,
00073   invalid_device_pointer       = cudaErrorInvalidDevicePointer,
00074   invalid_texture              = cudaErrorInvalidTexture,
00075   invalid_texture_binding      = cudaErrorInvalidTextureBinding,
00076   invalid_channel_descriptor   = cudaErrorInvalidChannelDescriptor,
00077   invalid_memcpy_direction     = cudaErrorInvalidMemcpyDirection,
00078   address_of_constant_error    = cudaErrorAddressOfConstant,
00079   texture_fetch_failed         = cudaErrorTextureFetchFailed,
00080   texture_not_bound            = cudaErrorTextureNotBound,
00081   synchronization_error        = cudaErrorSynchronizationError,
00082   invalid_filter_setting       = cudaErrorInvalidFilterSetting,
00083   invalid_norm_setting         = cudaErrorInvalidNormSetting,
00084   mixed_device_execution       = cudaErrorMixedDeviceExecution,
00085   cuda_runtime_unloading       = cudaErrorCudartUnloading,
00086   unknown                      = cudaErrorUnknown,
00087   not_yet_implemented          = cudaErrorNotYetImplemented,
00088   memory_value_too_large       = cudaErrorMemoryValueTooLarge,
00089   invalid_resource_handle      = cudaErrorInvalidResourceHandle,
00090   not_ready                    = cudaErrorNotReady,
00091   insufficient_driver          = cudaErrorInsufficientDriver,
00092   set_on_active_process_error  = cudaErrorSetOnActiveProcess,
00093   no_device                    = cudaErrorNoDevice,
00094   ecc_uncorrectable            = cudaErrorECCUncorrectable,
00095   startup_failure              = cudaErrorStartupFailure
00096 }; // end errc_t
00097 
00098 
00099 } // end namespace errc

00101 } // end namespace cuda
